text: jo log kaafir hain, yadyapi dharatee ke sabhee (dhan-dhaany) unake adhikaar (svaamitv) mein aa jaayen aur usee ke samaan aur bhee ho, taaki ve, ye sab pralay ke din kee yaatana se arth dand svaroop dekar mukt ho jaayen, to bhee unase sveekaar nahin kiya jaayega aur unhen dukhadaayee yaatana hogee
